00042 
00049   std::string operator ()(std::string name){
00050 
00051     std::string result= "";
00052 
00053     if (name=="VISHNU_CONFIG_FILE") {
00054 
00055       result="dietConfig";
00056     }
00057 
00058     if (name=="VISHNU_TRANSFER_CMD") {
00059

00062 
00063     return result;
00064   }

00079 boost::shared_ptr<Options>
00080 makeTransferCommandOptions(string pgName, 
00081     string& dietConfig,
00082     string& trCmdStr,
00083     string& src,
00084     string& dest){
00085 
00086   boost::shared_ptr<Options> opt(new Options(pgName));
00087 
00088   // Environement option
00089   opt->add("dietConfig,c",
00090       "The diet config file",
00091       ENV,
00092       dietConfig);
00093 
00094   opt->add("trCommand,t",
00095       "The command to use to perform file transfer. The different values  are:\n"
00096       "O or scp: for SCP transfer\n"
00097       "1 or rsync: for RSYNC transfer\n", 
00098       ENV,
00099       trCmdStr);
00100 
00101   opt->add("src,s",
00102       "The source file to copy following the pattern [host:]file path.",
00103       HIDDEN,
00104       src,1);
00105   opt->setPosition("src",1);
00106 
00107   opt->add("dest,d",
00108       "The path of the destination file.",
00109       HIDDEN,
00110       dest,1);
00111   opt->setPosition("dest",1);
00112 
00113   return opt;
00114 }

00137 void copyParseOptions (int argc, char* argv[],std::string& dietConfig,
00138     std::string& src, std::string& dest, FMS_Data::CpFileOptions& cpFileOptions, TransferType transferType){
00139 
00140   int ret; // Return value
00141 
00142   string trCmdStr;
00143 
00144   int trCmd;
00145 
00146   // build transfer command options
00147 
00148   boost::shared_ptr<Options> opt(makeTransferCommandOptions(argv[0], dietConfig, trCmdStr, src, dest));
00149 
00150   if (transferType==CP){
00151 
00152     opt->add("isRecursive,r",
00153         "It specifies when the copy is recursive (case of directory) or not.",
00154         CONFIG);
00155   }
00156 
00157   CLICmd cmd (argc, argv, opt);
00158 
00159   // Parse the cli and setting the options found
00160   ret = cmd.parse(FMS_env_name_mapper());
00161 
00162   if ( opt->count("help")){
00163     helpUsage(*opt,"[options] src dest");
00164     exit(0);
00165   }
00166 
00167 
00168 
00169   // Check for vishnu config file
00170 
00171   checkVishnuConfig(*opt);  
00172 
00173 
00174   if(trCmdStr.size()!=0) {
00175     size_t pos = trCmdStr.find_first_not_of("0123456789");
00176     if(pos!=std::string::npos) {
00177       if(trCmdStr.compare("scp")==0 || trCmdStr.compare("SCP")==0){
00178         trCmd = 0;
00179       } else if(trCmdStr.compare("rsync")==0 || trCmdStr.compare("RSYNC")==0){
00180         trCmd = 1;
00181       } else {
00182 
00183         errorUsage (argv[0],"Unknown file transfer command type "+trCmdStr,PARAMERROR);
00184         exit (CLI_ERROR_INVALID_PARAMETER);
00185       }
00186     } else {
00187       trCmd = convertToInt(trCmdStr);
00188     }
00189     cpFileOptions.setTrCommand(trCmd);
00190   }
00191 
00192 
00193   if (ret != CLI_SUCCESS){
00194     helpUsage(*opt,"[options] src dest");
00195     exit (ret);
00196   }
00197 
00198   if (opt->count("isRecursive")){
00199     cpFileOptions.setIsRecursive(true);
00200   }
00201 
00202 }

00214 struct TransferAsyncFunc {
00215 
00219   std::string msrc;
00220 
00225   std::string mdest;

00244   TransferAsyncFunc(const std::string& src,const std::string& dest,const FMS_Data::FileTransfer& transferInfo,const FMS_Data::CpFileOptions& cpFileOptions ):msrc(src),mdest(dest), mtransferInfo(transferInfo), mcpFileOptions (cpFileOptions) {};
00245 
00251   int operator()(const std::string& sessionKey) {
00252     int res;
00253     if (transferType==MV){
00254 
00255       res=moveAsyncFile(sessionKey, msrc, mdest, mtransferInfo, mcpFileOptions);
00256 
00257     }else {
00258 
00259 
00260       res=copyAsyncFile(sessionKey, msrc, mdest, mtransferInfo, mcpFileOptions);
00261     }
00262 
00263     std::cout << "The transfer identifier is " << mtransferInfo.getTransferId() << std::endl;
00264 
00265     return res;
00266   }
00267 };

00299 
00306   int operator()(const std::string& sessionKey) {
00307     int res;
00308     if (transferType==MV){
00309 
00310       res=moveFile(sessionKey, msrc, mdest, mcpFileOptions);
00311
